shinymui 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Timeline Input

Source: R/mui_timeline.R
mui_timelineInput.Rd

UI Shiny Input for Timeline

mui_timelineInput(
  inputId,
  value = NULL,
  position = "right",
  subvalues = NULL,
  ...
)

Arguments

inputId

Input id
value

list of items
position

text position c("right", "left", "alternate")
subvalues

subtext of each list title
...

other options

Examples


mui_timelineInput("timeline_1", value = c("List 1", "List 2", "List 3"), position = "alternate")
#> <span id="timeline_1" class="mui_timeline"></span>
#> <script id="timeline_1_value" type="application/json">[{"title":"List 1","text":"","dot_variant":"outlined","dot_color":"grey"},{"title":"List 2","text":"","dot_variant":"outlined","dot_color":"grey"},{"title":"List 3","text":"","dot_variant":"outlined","dot_color":"grey"}]</script>
#> <script id="timeline_1_configuration" type="application/json">{"position":"alternate"}</script>
